resources.string: The Artists Activity will display all the music stores in the mobile sorted by artist. At the bottom the name of the artist and the song name will be displayed and also there will be a pause/play button that will function the same way as in the Main Activity. \nTo gain access to the songs stored in the device Content Providers will be used, mainly ContentResolver and Cursor.
The same as Artists Activity but the data will be sorted by Album Name.
The same as the other two activities (Artists and Albums) but data is sorted by Song Name.
Here the user will have access to the all settings that will be implemented for the app, maybe equaliser settings.
